name: Green & Red Like/Dislike Bar
description: Reverts the like bar on YouTube to the original colour scheme, so you know, it actually makes sense again.

user.about: I made a YouTube style in four minutes, and then I uploaded it to this website.

additional_info:
If you want your own custom colours, replace the hex colour codes for like/dislikes with whatever you want.

Don't you just love how they decided to choose Blue and Gray for a website with a White and Red colour scheme?

discussions.name: How to change the color of like/dislike button
